bill.summary: 2/24/1994--Introduced. Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to terminate the eligibility of children under 16 for SSI by reason of disability. Amends SSA title XIX (Medicaid) to preserve the Medicaid eligibility of such disabled children who otherwise meet non-disability-related requirements for Medicaid eligibility.
